_description: On bequeathing worldly possessions — three couplets

CamTCC323.Transcription:
Godefrey þe guedehe deode asse vnledehe made gille prut
                    forta seeutor of al is goidAl þat heuere so doitcrist of
                    heuene wrþe hem wroit
CamTCC323.Note: Written 2 lines verse per line in MS.
CamTCC323.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             Catalogue of the
                    Western Manuscripts in the Library of Trinity College, Cambridge.
         4 vols. Cambridge: at the UP, 1900-1904: 1.441.
